persName.roleName: Duke of Edinburgh and Duke of Saxe-Coburg and Gotha

note.p: Birth: Windsor Castle, Berkshire, England (06 August 1844)
Death: Rosenau, near Coburg, Germany (30 July 1900)
Career: Entered the Royal Navy; Lieutenant (1863); Captain (1866); Rear Admiral (1878); Commander in Chief, Mediterranean (1886-1889); Admiral (1887); died of cardiac paralysis
Honours: KG 1863; KT 1864; Duke of Edinburgh 1866; GCMG 1869; GCSI 1870; KP 1880; GCB 1889; GCIE 1887; GCVO
